recipes.name: Apple Pie
recipes.desc: "The crispy, flaky pie crust and sweet apples are a match made in heaven."

recipes.name: Copious Meat Skewers
recipes.desc: "Just shove a bunch of meat on to a skewer and you're good to go."

recipes.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
recipes.desc: "The creamy mushroom and vegetable soup is so chunky it eats like a meal!"

recipes.name: Cream of Vegetable Soup
recipes.desc: "Made by simmering vegetables in milk, this healthy dish is as simple as the ingredients."

recipes.name: Creamy Seafood Soup
recipes.desc: "Thick-cut chunks of seafood and stock provides a satisfying savoriness."

recipes.name: Curry Pilaf
recipes.desc: "The goron spice used in this pilaf has given it a rich, spicy aroma."

recipes.name: Curry Rice
recipes.desc: "A favorite all over Hyrule, this simple dish has a flavor you just won't get tired of."

recipes.name: Egg Pudding
recipes.desc: "Made by cooking eggs and milk in a special mold, its soft texture melts in your mouth."

recipes.name: Egg Tart
recipes.desc: "You'll know this simple dessert is done baking when it smells just delightful."

recipes.name: Fish and Mushroom Skewer
recipes.desc: "A simple dish made by cooking skewered, fresh fish alongside fragrant mushrooms."

recipes.name: Fish Pie
recipes.desc: "A mainstay in any fisherman's home, the crisp crust pairs well with the fishy flavor."

recipes.name: Fish Skewer
recipes.desc: "A simple dish made by cooking chunks of fresh fish on a skewer."

recipes.name: Fragrant Mushroom Saute
recipes.desc: "The fragrant aroma of this sauteed spice and mushroom dish makes your mouth water."

recipes.name: Fried Egg and Rice
recipes.desc: "The soft egg yolk pairs well with the fresh rice in this simple dish."

recipes.name: Fried Wild Greens
recipes.desc: "A basic vegetable dish made by sauteing fresh wild plants."

recipes.name: Fruit and Mushroom Mix
recipes.desc: "This dish contrasts the sweetness of fruit with the savoriness of mushrooms."

recipes.name: Fruit Pie
recipes.desc: "A celebration isn't a celebration until this fruit-filled crust hits the table!"

recipes.name: Fruitcake
recipes.desc: "Making ample use of fruits found all over Hyrule, this cake is a must for celebrations."

recipes.name: Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl
recipes.desc: "Only the most carefully selected cuts of high-quality meats go into this dish."

recipes.name: Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry
recipes.desc: "A marriage of the choicest cuts of meat and seafood. As delicious as it is filling!"

recipes.name: Gourmet Meat Curry
recipes.desc: "The high-quality meat used in this prized dish satisfies meat and curry lovers alike."

recipes.name: Gourmet Meat Stew
recipes.desc: "The meat has simmered for so long it melts in your mouth. A true bucket-list meal!"

recipes.name: Gourmet Poultry Curry
recipes.desc: "Once served in Hyrule Castle, the poultry used in this dish is of immensely high quality."

recipes.name: Gourmet Poultry Pilaf
recipes.desc: "Made with the highest-quality poultry, every bite of this pilaf floods your mouth with flavor."

recipes.name: Gourmet Spiced Meat Skewer
recipes.desc: "The rich aroma and juicy texture of this high-quality meat puts it in a league of its own."

recipes.name: Herb Saute
recipes.desc: "A fragrant mixture of herbs and spices. It's easily recognized by its unique aroma."

recipes.name: Hot Buttered Apple
recipes.desc: "The apple's sweetness has been enhanced by smothering it with butter and baking it."

recipes.name: Meat and Mushroom Skewer
recipes.desc: "A filling dish made by grilling various mountain ingredients with either steak or bird meat."

recipes.name: Meat and Rice Bowl
recipes.desc: "This dish of rice and lightly seared meat is a mainstay all throughout Hyrule."

recipes.name: Meat and Seafood Fry
recipes.desc: "A filling dish made by cooking fresh seafood and meat together."

recipes.name: Meat Curry
recipes.desc: "The heat from the spice allows you to enjoy the large portion of the meat's savoriness."

recipes.name: Meat Pie
recipes.desc: "You'll need an extra napkin to deal with this juicy pie of perfectly baked minced meat."

recipes.name: Meat Skewer
recipes.desc: "A juicy, filling snack made by grilling small chunks of meat on a skewer."

recipes.name: Meat Stew
recipes.desc: "The hearty meat in this mainstay dish leaves bellies satisfied all throughout Hyrule."

recipes.name: Meaty Rice Balls
recipes.desc: "The sweet and spicy meat stuffed into these rice balls will keep you full for some time."

recipes.name: Milk
recipes.desc: "Make this by heating up some milk. Drink it before bed to ensure a good night's sleep."

recipes.name: Monster Cake
recipes.desc: "It's said that once you have a taste of this cake, you'll never forget its sweetness."

recipes.name: Monster Curry
recipes.desc: "This unusual take on curry uses monster extract and doesn't rely on spices."

recipes.name: Mushroom Rice Balls
recipes.desc: "The aroma of the mushrooms tickles your nose as you peel back the leafy wrapping."

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.desc: "The tantalizing aroma of mushrooms and butter beckons you to the table."

recipes.name: Mushroom Skewer
recipes.desc: "This simple mushroom-packed skewer has its colorful presentation to thank for its appeal."

recipes.name: Nutcake
recipes.desc: "Forest nuts give this cake a pleasant texture and a simple, understated sweetness."

recipes.name: Omelet
recipes.desc: "This simple dish is common all over Hyrule. Simply fry egg until it's nice and plump."

recipes.name: Plain Crepe
recipes.desc: "The simplicity of this dish lets the flavor of its ingredients shine."

recipes.name: Poultry Curry
recipes.desc: "The savory meat pairs well with the aroma of spice in this common curry."

recipes.name: Poultry Pilaf
recipes.desc: "Sauteed Hylian rice steamed in poultry broth. Cook on low heat until the rice is fluffy."

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Fish
recipes.desc: "A simple dish made by rolling a whole fish in natural rock salt before grilling it."

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Gourmet Meat
recipes.desc: "This lavish grilled dish makes liberal use of high-quality cuts of meat."

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Greens
recipes.desc: "A health-boosting dish made with leafy greens and a touch of salt."

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Meat
recipes.desc: "Short on ingredients? Just rub some meat in salt and cook it for a simple, tasty dish."

recipes.name: Salt-Grilled Mushrooms
recipes.desc: "A basic mushroom dish made by lightly salting mushrooms and grilling them."

recipes.name: Seafood Meuniere
recipes.desc: "Rich butter flanks fresh seafood. The secret ingredient is lots and lots of love."

recipes.name: Seafood Rice Balls
recipes.desc: "Stuffed with aromatic seafood, the flavor can vary by ingredients but never disappoints."

recipes.name: Simmered Fruit
recipes.desc: "This sweet dish is made by heaping tasty fruits into a pan and simmering until tender."

recipes.name: Spiced Meat Skewer
recipes.desc: "A special Goron spice covers up the scent of the meat, allowing its flavor to shine."

recipes.name: Steamed Fish
recipes.desc: "A refined dish made by wrapping a fresh fish in fragrant wild greens and cooking it."

recipes.name: Steamed Fruit
recipes.desc: "A regional dish made by steaming near-ripened fruits in the leaves of fragrant plants."

recipes.name: Steamed Meat
recipes.desc: "This meat dish has been wrapped in fragrant leaves and steamed to preserve its moisture."

recipes.name: Steamed Mushrooms
recipes.desc: "A healthy vegetable dish achieved by steaming mushrooms in plant leaves."

recipes.name: Veggie Rice Balls
recipes.desc: "This home-style dish of Kakariko Village is stuffed with the bounty of the mountains."

recipes.name: Wheat Bread
recipes.desc: "Made with wheat from the Tabantha region, this soft, springy bread smells just heavenly."

recipes.name: Carrot Cake
recipes.desc: "Even those who don't like carrots tend to enjoy the mild sweetness of this cake."

recipes.name: Clam Chowder
recipes.desc: "The nutritional value of hearty blueshell snail combines with butter and milk in a rich soup."

recipes.name: Crab Risotto
recipes.desc: "An everyday stable of seaside villages, the secret to its delicious flavor lies in crab fat."

recipes.name: Crab Stir-Fry
recipes.desc: "The Goron spice used in preparing this crab pairs perfectly with the flavor of the meat."

recipes.name: Creamy Heart Soup
recipes.desc: "Enjoying this sweet soup with another person will bring you both closer together."

recipes.name: Fried Bananas
recipes.desc: "Children love fried mighty bananas. The trick is frying them over very high heat."

recipes.name: Glazed Meat
recipes.desc: "The sweetness of the honey permeates the meat, giving it a complex taste profile."

recipes.name: Glazed Mushrooms
recipes.desc: "The honey in this mushroom dish gives it a sweet, complex taste and a savory finish."

recipes.name: Glazed Veggies
recipes.desc: "Don't like the taste of vegetables? Simply saute them in honey for a salty-sweet flavor!"

recipes.name: Honeyed Apple
recipes.desc: "A juicy sweet-and-sour dish combining newly ripened apples with honey."

recipes.name: Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin
recipes.desc: "This hollow, meat-filled fortified pumpkin is a local specialty of Kakariko Village."

recipes.name: Pepper Seafood
recipes.desc: "The pepper seeds grilled with this seafood draw out its taste and pleasant aroma."

recipes.name: Pepper Steak
recipes.desc: "The meat has been cooked in crushed peppers to accentuate its natural taste."

recipes.name: Porgy Meuniere
recipes.desc: "Popular among residents of coastal regions, this juicy porgy is a delish dish."

recipes.name: Pumpkin Stew
recipes.desc: "Simply simmer a fortified pumpkin to make this dish. A favorite in Kakariko Village."

recipes.name: Seafood Fried Rice
recipes.desc: "Various seafood has been sauteed with rice. The stronger the flame, the tastier the dish!"

recipes.name: Seafood Paella
recipes.desc: "No fisherman's birthday bash would be complete without this top-shelf seafood dish."

recipes.name: Seafood Skewer
recipes.desc: "The natural water in this medley of seafaring creatures makes for a delicious broth."

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
recipes.desc: "This healthy curry is popular for its mild flavor and moderate spiciness."

recipes.name: Veggie Cream Soup
recipes.desc: "This creamy soup showcases the sweetness of vegetables in a veritable taste explosion."

recipes.name: Energizing Honey Crepe
recipes.desc: "Honey has been drizzled over thin crepes to bring out their natural sweetness and flavor."

recipes.name: Spicy Sauteed Peppers
recipes.desc: "The spiciness of these sauteed peppers has been broken by the heat for a sweeter taste."
